text: (INkosi) yathi “lwaluyini udaba lwenu ngenkathi nanifuna ukwenza ukukhohlakala kuJosefa na?” (Abesifazane) bathi “isiphephelo singesika Mvelinqangi asizange sazi ukuthi simenzela ububi” unkosikazi ka-Al-Azizi wathi “manje selisobala iqiniso mina ngangifuna ukwenza ukukhohlakala kuyena futhi ngempela yena waba ngomunye wabaneqiniso.”
